mapping.sql: select i.IND_ID, IND_CODE, IND_NAME, t.ind_type_desc, COALESCE(BUS_EXP,' ') BUS_EXP, COALESCE(SKILL_EXP,' ') SKILL_EXP, COALESCE(OTHER_EXP,' ') OTHER_EXP, ORD, s.DEPARTMENT_CODE, m.depart_desc, FACTORY_CON, MAINTE_MAN, to_char(UPDATE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mm:ss') UPDATE_TIME, '修改指标' UPDATE_IND from E_IND_EXP i, E_IND_EXP_DETAILS s , E_IND_TYPE t , E_department m where i.IND_ID = s.IND_ID(+) and s.department_code = m.depart_code(+) and s.ind_type_code = t.ind_type_code(+) and UPDATE_TIME in (select max(UPDATE_TIME) from E_IND_EXP_DETAILS group by ind_id) {and i.ind_name like '%'||#ind_name#||'%' } {and s.ind_type_code=#ind_type_code# } order by ord

insert into E_IND_EXP (ind_id, ind_name) values (#ind_seq#,#ind_name#); insert into E_IND_EXP_DETAILS ( ID, IND_ID, IND_CODE, IND_TYPE_CODE, BUS_EXP, SKILL_EXP, OTHER_EXP, ORD, DEPARTMENT_CODE, FACTORY_CON, MAINTE_MAN, CREATE_MAN, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_MAN, UPDATE_TIME) values(E_IND_SEQ.nextval, #ind_seq#, #ind_code#, #ind_type_code#, #bus_exp#, #skill_exp#, #other_exp#, #ord#, #department_code#, #factory_con#, #mainte_man#, #create_man#, sysdate, #update_man#, sysdate);
select ind_name from E_IND_EXP E1, E_IND_EXP_DETAILS E2 where E1.ind_id = E2.ind_id and ind_name = #ind_name# and ind_code = #ind_code# and ind_type_code = #ind_type_code#
select ind_name from E_IND_EXP E1, E_IND_EXP_DETAILS E2 where E1.ind_id = E2.ind_id and ind_name = #ind_name# and ind_code = #ind_code# and ind_type_code = #ind_type_code# and E2.ind_id != #ind_id#

update E_IND_EXP set ind_name=#ind_name# where ind_id=#ind_id#; update E_IND_EXP_DETAILS set IND_CODE=#ind_code#, IND_TYPE_CODE=#ind_type_code#, BUS_EXP=#bus_exp#, SKILL_EXP=#skill_exp#, OTHER_EXP=#other_exp#, ORD=#ord#, DEPARTMENT_CODE=#department_code#, FACTORY_CON=#factory_con#, MAINTE_MAN=#mainte_man#, UPDATE_MAN=#update_man#, UPDATE_TIME=sysdate where ind_id=#ind_id# and id=#id#;
select ind_name from E_IND_EXP E1, E_IND_EXP_DETAILS E2 where E1.ind_id = E2.ind_id and ind_name = #ind_name# and ind_code = #ind_code# and ind_type_code = #ind_type_code# and E2.ind_id != #ind_id#

update E_IND_EXP set ind_name=#ind_name# where ind_id=#ind_id#; insert into E_IND_EXP_DETAILS ( ID, IND_ID, IND_TYPE_CODE, BUS_EXP, SKILL_EXP, OTHER_EXP, ORD, DEPARTMENT_CODE, FACTORY_CON, MAINTE_MAN, CREATE_MAN, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_MAN, UPDATE_TIME) values(E_IND_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #ind_id#, #ind_type_code#, #bus_exp#, #skill_exp#, #other_exp#, #ord#, #department_code#, #factory_con#, #mainte_man#, #create_man#, sysdate, #update_man#, sysdate);
select E_IND_SEQ.nextval as i from dual

select i.IND_ID, ind_code, IND_NAME, t.ind_type_desc, BUS_EXP, SKILL_EXP, OTHER_EXP, ORD, DEPARTMENT_CODE, m.depart_desc, FACTORY_CON, MAINTE_MAN, (select user_name from E_USER where user_id=CREATE_MAN) CREATE_MAN, to_char(CREATE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss') CREATE_TIME, (select user_name from E_USER where user_id=UPDATE_MAN) UPDATE_MAN, to_char(UPDATE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss') UPDATE_TIME from E_IND_EXP i, E_IND_EXP_DETAILS s , E_IND_TYPE t ,E_DEPARTMENT m where i.IND_ID = s.IND_ID and s.ind_type_code = t.ind_type_code and id = #id.id# and m.depart_code(+) = s.department_code

select ID, IND_CODE, i.IND_ID, IND_NAME, s.ind_type_code, t.ind_type_desc, BUS_EXP, SKILL_EXP, OTHER_EXP, ORD, DEPARTMENT_CODE, d.depart_desc, FACTORY_CON, MAINTE_MAN, (select user_name from E_USER where user_id=CREATE_MAN) create_man, to_char(CREATE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mm:ss') CREATE_TIME, (select user_name from E_USER where user_id=UPDATE_MAN) UPDATE_MAN, to_char(UPDATE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mm:ss') UPDATE_TIME, to_char(UPDATE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-ddhh:mm:ss') UPDATETIME from E_IND_EXP i, E_IND_EXP_DETAILS s , E_IND_TYPE t,e_department d where i.IND_ID = s.IND_ID and s.ind_type_code = t.ind_type_code and i.ind_id = #ind_id# and update_time in (select max(update_time) from E_IND_EXP_DETAILS where ind_id=#ind_id#) and d.depart_code(+)=s.department_code
